name: Dexter Williams
about: Dexter Williams, the founder of Dexter Fitness Trainer, brings over 15 years of experience in the fitness industry. As a former professional athlete and certified fitness expert.
experience: Over 15 years in the fitness industry

name: Emma Rodriguez
about: Emma Rodriguez, our Holistic Wellness Specialist, boasts over a decade of experience in yoga, nutrition, and mindfulness. With a keen understanding of the mind-body connection.
experience: 10+ years in yoga, nutrition, and mindfulness

name: Max Turner
about: Max Turner, our Strength and Conditioning Coach, brings 12 years of specialized experience in strength training to Dexter Fitness Trainer. His journey includes working with diverse clients.

name: Carla Martinez
about: Meet Carla Martinez, our Cardiovascular Fitness Expert at Dexter Fitness Trainer. With 8 years of experience in high-intensity workouts, Her passion for dynamic workouts makes her a driving force.
